Text: Trimester I Cc email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email Dear Algebra students Trimester I is coming to a close I wanted you to know that Ive been very impressed with your mathematical expertise and problem solving You have accepted the challenge of the new CD program with enthusiasm even when I make you complete tedious portfolios You goodnaturedly worked in groups on a word problem test even though its very difficult to depend on others for your grade Overall youve completed homework more consistently than any group Ive taught in the past You deserve a resounding Congratulationskeep up the great work Mrs Ward

Missing Homework Cc Dear Nora I just wanted you to be aware that youve missed homework assignments this trimester Homework allows you to practice your skills and it keeps your average high since I only check homework for completion I would like you to set a goal for yourself to not miss any more assignments Also remember that you can complete extra credit work to substitute for missed assignments Mrs Ward

Tuesday Tutoring Cancelled Cc email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email There will not be Tuesday Tutoring tomorrow I know that some of you are having troublewrite down your questions and come to tutoring the Tuesday after Thanksgiving In the meantime enjoy your holiday Mrs Ward

Algebra Information Cc email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email Dear Algebra Students You successfully completed Trimester I and were headed into Trimester II As Im sure youve already noticed the material is getting more and more challenging You should also be aware that I will be expecting more and more higher level thinking as the year progresses The Unit Test is a good example of the thinking skills that Id like to see The multiple choice questions were quite challenging and required that you apply what wed learned Although the class average was on this test and many of you scored lower than you normally do I think that we have to give ourselves credit for passing such a challenging test The best news is that your portfolio grades will more than make up for a lower test score One might say that I even planned it that way Now we have to get ready for the next test It will be a similar test in style and difficulty and we wont be doing a portfolio So you should take the Unit Test and study the type of questions that you missed Dont worryI know you can handle this By the end of the year you will be a superb test taker and algebraist PS Dont forget to discuss your Unit Test score with your parents They had to take challenging tests in their day and they can help you prepare for the types of questions even if theyve forgotten some of the math Mrs Ward

into Trimester II As Im sure youve already noticed the material is getting more and more challenging You should also be aware that I will be expecting more and more higher level thinking as the year progresses The Unit Test is a good example of the thinking skills that Id like to see The multiple choice questions were quite challenging and required that you apply what wed learned Although the class average was on this test and many of you scored lower than you normally do I think that we have to give ourselves credit for passing such a challenging test The best news is that your portfolio grades will more than make up for a lower test score One might say that I even planned it that way Now we have to get ready for the next test It will be a similar test in style and difficulty and we wont be doing a portfolio So you should take the Unit Test and study the type of questions that you missed Dont worryI know you can handle this By the end of the year you will be a superb test taker and algebraist PS Dont forget to discuss your Unit Test score with your parents They had to take challenging tests in their day and they can help you prepare for the types of questions even if theyve forgotten some of the math Mrs Ward

Unit Tests Cc email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email email Dear th Grade Algebra Students The last Unit Test was taken today during th periods I will return tests to Groups B and C in class today Group A will get theirs during Period tomorrow if you want it sooner stop by between classes today PS Your parents are aware that Im returning these Mrs Ward
